PERSONA:
carlos is a 35-year-old puerto rican man living in a metropolitan area in the northeast region of the united states, specifically in new england. he has been residing in the country for 15 years after moving from puerto rico. carlos has some college education but did not obtain a degree.

despite his hispanic heritage, carlos identifies more with the "other race" category. he is a u.s. citizen and has never been married. religiously, he does not subscribe to any particular faith and considers himself unaffiliated, never attending religious services.

politically, carlos aligns himself with the democratic party, though his ideology leans more towards moderate or conservative views. his annual income falls below $30,000, placing him in the lower-income tier. he is a registered voter but uses the internet less frequently.

carlos does not actively participate in volunteer work or community service. overall, he leads a relatively simple life, focusing on his work and personal interests within his metropolitan community in the northeast.
